## Classes

### <a name="mimir"></a>`mimir`

== Class: mimir

Install, configure, manage Mimir metrics platform.
For a deep dive in mimir configuration see https://grafana.com/docs/mimir/latest/

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `mimir` class:

* [`package_ensure`](#-mimir--package_ensure)
* [`manage_user`](#-mimir--manage_user)
* [`user_home`](#-mimir--user_home)
* [`user_shell`](#-mimir--user_shell)
* [`user_extra_groups`](#-mimir--user_extra_groups)
* [`config_dir`](#-mimir--config_dir)
* [`config_group`](#-mimir--config_group)
* [`config_hash`](#-mimir--config_hash)
* [`config_owner`](#-mimir--config_owner)
* [`custom_args`](#-mimir--custom_args)
* [`log_dir_path`](#-mimir--log_dir_path)
* [`log_dir_mode`](#-mimir--log_dir_mode)
* [`log_file_path`](#-mimir--log_file_path)
* [`log_file_mode`](#-mimir--log_file_mode)
* [`log_group`](#-mimir--log_group)
* [`log_owner`](#-mimir--log_owner)
* [`log_to_file`](#-mimir--log_to_file)
* [`validate_cmd`](#-mimir--validate_cmd)
* [`restart_cmd`](#-mimir--restart_cmd)
* [`restart_on_change`](#-mimir--restart_on_change)
* [`systemd_overrides`](#-mimir--systemd_overrides)

##### <a name="-mimir--package_ensure"></a>`package_ensure`

Data type: `String`

Mimir version under the form X.X.X

Default value: `'present'`

##### <a name="-mimir--manage_user"></a>`manage_user`

Data type: `Boolean`

Boolean to specify if module should manage mimir user

Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-mimir--user_home"></a>`user_home`

Data type: `String`

Home directory for the managed user

Default value: `'/var/lib/mimir'`

##### <a name="-mimir--user_shell"></a>`user_shell`

Data type: `String`

Binary to use as shell for managed user

Default value: `'/sbin/nologin'`

##### <a name="-mimir--user_extra_groups"></a>`user_extra_groups`

Data type: `Array`

Additionnal groups the managed user should be connected to

Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="-mimir--config_dir"></a>`config_dir`

Data type: `String`

Directory to store the mimir configuration

Default value: `'/etc/mimir'`

##### <a name="-mimir--config_group"></a>`config_group`

Data type: `String`

Group to use for configuration resources

Default value: `'mimir'`

##### <a name="-mimir--config_hash"></a>`config_hash`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash containing the configuration keys to override

Default value: `{}`

##### <a name="-mimir--config_owner"></a>`config_owner`

Data type: `String`

Owner to use for configuration resources

Default value: `'mimir'`

##### <a name="-mimir--custom_args"></a>`custom_args`

Data type: `Array`

Additional arguments to set to the mimir process

Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="-mimir--log_dir_path"></a>`log_dir_path`

Data type: `String`

Directory to store mimir logs if log to file is enabled

Default value: `'/var/log/mimir'`

##### <a name="-mimir--log_dir_mode"></a>`log_dir_mode`

Data type: `String`

Mode of the directory used to store logs

Default value: `'0700'`

##### <a name="-mimir--log_file_path"></a>`log_file_path`

Data type: `String`

Filename to store mimir logs if log to file is enabled

Default value: `'mimir.log'`

##### <a name="-mimir--log_file_mode"></a>`log_file_mode`

Data type: `String`

Mode of the file used to store logs

Default value: `'0600'`

##### <a name="-mimir--log_group"></a>`log_group`

Data type: `String`

Group to use for log resources

Default value: `'root'`

##### <a name="-mimir--log_owner"></a>`log_owner`

Data type: `String`

Owner to use for log resources

Default value: `'root'`

##### <a name="-mimir--log_to_file"></a>`log_to_file`

Data type: `Boolean`

Should log be kept in journald or sent to a dedicated file

Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-mimir--validate_cmd"></a>`validate_cmd`

Data type: `String`

Command use to validate configuration

Default value: `'/usr/local/bin/mimir --modules=true'`

##### <a name="-mimir--restart_cmd"></a>`restart_cmd`

Data type: `String`

Command use to restart/reload process

Default value: `'/bin/systemctl reload mimir'`

##### <a name="-mimir--restart_on_change"></a>`restart_on_change`

Data type: `Boolean`

Should the process be restarted on configuration changes

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-mimir--systemd_overrides"></a>`systemd_overrides`

Data type: `Hash`

List of systemd parameters to override

Default value:

```puppet
{
        'Service' => {
            # Mimir needs to open quite a lot of socket, this value seems widely used for high traffic softwares.
            'LimitNOFILE' => '1048576'
        }
    }
```

### <a name="mimir--config"></a>`mimir::config`

== Class: mimir::config

Configure Mimir metrics platform.
For a deep dive in mimir configuration see https://grafana.com/docs/mimir/latest/

### <a name="mimir--install"></a>`mimir::install`

== Class: mimir::install

Install Mimir metrics platform.

### <a name="mimir--service"></a>`mimir::service`

== Class: mimir::service

Manage service associated to Mimir metrics platform.
